seller_description: Experience unmatched entertainment with the Xgody Gimbal5 Smart Projector, a compact and versatile device perfect for home theaters, gaming, and travel. Powered by Android 11, it comes pre-installed with apps like Netflix and YouTube, offering access to over 7,000+ applications. Equipped with 5G dual-band WiFi 6 and Eshare wireless mirroring, it ensures seamless content sharing and low latency streaming. Boasting a native 1920x1080p resolution, 18,000 lumens, and a 10,000:1 contrast ratio, it delivers stunning visuals on a screen size of up to 150 inches. The short-throw 1.1:1 projection ratio and 180° rotation support provide flexible placement on walls or ceilings. Enhanced with Bluetooth 5.2, built-in 3W HiFi speakers, and compatibility with HDMI, USB, and 3.5mm connections, it easily connects to devices like TV sticks, laptops, and gaming consoles. Compact at 6.5x4.3x3.5 inches, it’s lightweight and portable, making it ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. The Xgody Gimbal5 offers innovative features and exceptional performance, delivering an entertainment experience that exceeds expectations.
review: I had a projector before, however it can only use at night on the wall. This one is so much better! I can project it on my ceiling so I can watch movie or Netflix when I lay on my bed. The size is also smaller than my old one, it will be easy for me to bring along when I travel! It makes family movie nights easier! The features are also more advanced, my nephews love them, they can watch in their room without taking the TV in the living room. Love it!
Expected_output: Based on the seller's description and images, the Xgody Gimbal5 Smart Projector delivers a compact and versatile entertainment solution boasting Android 11 functionality, a 1920x1080p resolution, 18,000 lumens, and advanced features like auto-keystone correction, 5G WiFi, Bluetooth 5.2, and Eshare wireless mirroring. The seller's description aligns well with the provided images, showcasing the device's lightweight, portable design and its ability to project clear visuals on walls or ceilings up to 150 inches. The buyer's updated review highlights the projector's advantages over their previous model, emphasizing its flexibility in placement, advanced features, and improved portability, which enhances family movie nights and personal use. The buyer's satisfaction is evident, as they express appreciation for the ease of use, high-quality image projection even on ceilings, and the projector's suitability for travel and children. The seller meets the buyer's expectations without discrepancies. Therefore, the buyer is satisfied, and no fault lies with the seller
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
